item.title: I-15 South - Exit 62
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 62 - BL-15/UT-130/To UT-14 East/North Main. This is the north end of the Cedar City business loop.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 62
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 62 - BL-15/UT-130/To UT-14 East/North Main. This is the north end of the Cedar City business loop.

item.title: End UT-14 West at BL-15/UT-130
item.description: End UT-14 West at BL-15/UT-130 in Cedar City.

item.title: End UT-148 South at UT-14
item.description: End UT-148 south at UT-14. Turn right on UT-14 for Cedar City and I-15. Turn left on UT-14 for US-89. UT-14 is part of the Markagunt High Plateau Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-89 South at UT-14
item.description: US-89 South at UT-14 west at Long Valley Junction.

item.title: US-89 South at UT-14
item.description: UT-89 south at UT-14 west to Duck Creek, Cedar Breaks (National Monument), and Cedar City. Continue south on US-89 for Mt. Carmel Junction.

item.title: US-89 South Approaching UT-14
item.description: US-89 South approaching UT-14 at Long Valley Junction.

item.title: US-89 North at UT-14 West
item.description: US-89 north at UT-14 west. Both UT-14 and US-89 are Utah Scenic Byways.

item.title: US-89 North Approaching UT-14
item.description: US-89 North approaching UT-14 at Long Valley Junction. Use UT-14 west for Cedar City, Duck Creek, and Cedar Breaks National Monument. Continue north on US-89 for Panguitch and Salt Lake.

item.title: End UT-14 East at US-89
item.description: End UT-14 east at US-89. US-89 is marked as a Utah scenic byway.

item.title: End UT-14 East at US-89
item.description: UT-14 east approaching US-89. Use US-89 north for Panguitch and Bryce Canyon. Use US-89 south for Kanab.

item.title: UT-14 East at UT-148
item.description: UT-14 east approaching UT-148 north to Cedar Breaks, Panguitch Lake, and Brian Head.

item.title: UT-14 East - Cedar Breaks Road Status
item.description: UT-14 east above Cedar City. Road closure information for UT-148/Cedar Breaks Road.

item.title: UT-130 North Approaching UT-14
item.description: UT-130 north approaching UT-14. Use UT-14 east for Cedar Breaks and Bryce Canyon. Turn left for Southern Utah University.

item.title: UT-130 North Approaching UT-14
item.description: UT-130 north approaching UT-14. UT-14 is marked as a Utah scenic byway.
